title: DTCG Resolver Schema
description: JSON Schema for the Design Tokens Community Group (DTCG) Resolver specification

name.title: Name
name.description: A short, human-readable name for the document.

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of the resolver specification. Must be '2025.10'.

description.title: Description
description.description: A human-readable description for this document.

sets.title: Token Sets
sets.description: Definition of sets. A set is a collection of design tokens in DTCG format.

modifiers.title: Modifiers
modifiers.description: Definition of modifiers. A modifier allows for conditional inclusion of token values via contexts.

$defs.title: Definitions
$defs.description: Optional definitions that tools MAY support but MUST NOT throw an error when encountered.
